description: Kazuma manages to get himself killed again. He uses the opportunity to try to hit on the goddess Eris, and is reluctant to return to life.

titles.title: Des adieux pour ce monde bien relou !
Goodbye to This Irritating Living World!
Kono Wazurawashii Gaikai ni Sayonara o!
この煩わしい外界にさよならを!
向紛紜擾嚷的外界說聲再會！
